comments.comment: The fact Maya lived 2 years more than most pugs tells you everything you need to know about how well they have both looked after her. May she rest in peace
You gave her the best life a pug could have. Living up to 17yrs is such a rarity to most dogs. For me you did your best for maya

She really is an angel. I felt like Maya just waited for everything to settle in its right place (Felix and Marzia moving to their dream home, and them having a baby) before bidding good bye. Still missing our little Jabba the hut. Fly high our baby Maya.
So heartbreaking yet so heartwarming. We will miss you, Maya.

Most of us grew up with Maya, and we are very sad about the unfortunate passing, but I can tell that Felix and Marzia themselves including Edgar would've felt way more pain than just us fans. Rest in Peace Maya!
Rest in Peace Maya, aka. Jabba the Hutt

The fact she live for 17/18yrs is so impressive, and more than that she was a big part of your family for so long, I also find the memories you share with a pet is also quite hard to handle when you lose them. Maya seemed like such a placid dog too , I’m glad you adopted her and gave her the life she deserved
You guys have done the best job anyone could have ever done. Thank you for taking care of her the way you did.
Losing a dog is truly heart breaking. It's like losing a family member. Rest easy maya, your name will forever live on with this channel!

When I first heard the news of Maya passing away, it didn't hit me that hard. But when Felix started talking about how much he loved her, I broke into tears. You and Marzia took such great care of her and showed her so much love, she couldn'y have gotten a better family

She stayed with you as your baby girl until you were ready to welcome your own baby 

She didn’t stay as long as you wanted her to, but she stayed exactly the time she was needed to. What a very good dog x

Haven't watched a full PewDiePie since I was like 15 or 16, I'm nearly 23. This is one of my favorite videos on YouTube now. The atmosphere is immaculate, it's personal and bittersweet. Rip Maya, she was the sweetest lil pug. 

Late Merry Christmas and late Happy New Years to everyone on the the YT comments and Felix and his family.
Losing a dog is always hard, you two definitely gave her a great life. She lived a long life! Thank you for adopting her

I lost my beloved Miia half a year ago, I raised that cat since birth and she was very close to me. It felt like losing my kid. It can get really hard, but letting out all my emotions and making sure to honor her and the good memories really helped. I wish you guys the best

I've been watching pewds since I was 13, I'm now 25. 
It's so heart warming going through these events with you but it hurts so much when there is a loss. 
If a hug could be given through a phone, you'd have a billion.

I hope you know it’s not that it “wasn’t enough in the end” you did everything you were supposed to. You were an amazing owner and it shows. She passed away knowing she was loved by the people she loved. Stay strong Pewds

It breaks my heart to see felix this sad, I can absolutely empathize with him, I had so many dogs in my life and it always hurt so bad when they passed away. Just letting you guys know that you did such an amazing job taking care of her, she lived so long for a little dog! Sending lots of love to you and marzia♡

Watching this 2 weeks after having to have my 18 year old kitty put to sleep is making me cry. I feel your pain, I hope the best for you, Marzia, and your 2 other pups. 
Her name will live on in my house through a fluffy white chihuahua, I convinced my mom to let me name her after Maya back in 2018 because I thought the name was so pretty. ♡

All the fun times with Maya won’t be forgotten
Rest in Peace Maya
Maya will be much missed she looks like she had such a peaceful wonderful life and Japan was a dream! What a good doggo and good parents, you live on!

A pet isn't just a pet they are a part of a family, an important part. They make us smile and bring us joy. We love them and they love us. You take care of each other, so it hurts a lot when they pass. But you still hold all that love and those happy memories with you.
Rip sweet girl Maya

She will be remembered by this whole generation of people I’m 23 and I’ve been watching you since I was about 13-14 maya was the worlds dog and we will remember her until our last days it’s just cemented
He’s trying so hard to smile and laugh. Hope he and Marzia will get better soon. I’m sure they will!
Seeing Pewds tear up and his voice breaking made me tear up too.

The abandoned places makes me hope that Pewds will start some urban exploring vlogs.
And to Felix and Marzia, I'm so sorry for your loss. You both did so great with Maya. You gave her such a great and enriching life. I'm happy she had you both. Wishing you both the best!
Losing maya is hard to see may she rest in Peace and sorry for your loss.

We all loved Maya and we will all miss her, but she had a fantastic life with you and Marzia. Maybe it's crazy to think that but I'm convinced that Maya waited for you guys to get Momo so you and Edgar wouldn't feel alone, and once Momo entered the family she knew she was leaving you all in good paws  <3

I started to tear up when Felix got emotional about the stories and the sacrifices they've done to keep Maya healthy, shows how much Maya ment for them, and for us the fanbase, I remember watching the videos where she would appear, as well as listening to the "Jabba the Hut" song non-stop, I understand how hard it is to lose someone that is a family member that you loved and care the most, She'll always be remembered the way she was, R.I.P. Maya, you'll always be in our hearts ️.

I know the feeling of losing a dog that you’re really close to. I had a golden retriever that I grew up with till I was 13 when I had to put her down, towards the end it got really hard to see her get weak and unable to do certain things like run around and eventually even walk. Just know we’re here for you bro. She’s at peace, feeling no pain in a better place.

Maya, sweetest girl ever 
Pewds and Marzia are lucky to have had such a cute pug. And Maya is lucky to have had such wonderful parents. We will miss you, Maya ️

Felix, you did do enough for her. All the love and care in the world can't stop death. All that grief you feel is just love that has nowhere to go anymore. Loving Maya as hard as you could is all she needed to be happy, even as she passed. Maya passing isn't because you didn't do enough for her. She passed because it's her time, and you gave her an amazing life with you and Marzia. You did nothing but love that dog as she deserved

If it helps, I reccomend getting a shadow box and placing a few of Mayas favorite items inside. We did that when my dog passed, and it's nice to see his collar and favorite toys. I miss him a lot and it still hurts but thinking of all of our memories together makes it enough to know that he loved us, probably even more than we loved him

Goodbye Jabba the hut, you were a treasure and will always be remembered. Ill never forget my cat that I had for 14 years either, Annie was a sweet little thing with 6 toes! It cant be avoided sadly...

Havent watched pewdiepie in a while and came back to this video. This to me is like we've been watching a long running anime where we see the main character go through their ups and downs, and their different story arcs. And now we've come near the end where he finally has everything hes been working towards, and is happy and at peace. Like I lived through everything with pewds and now we finally get to have desert/satisfaction at the end. Its nice
Watching Felix cry is like seeing your dad cry; gives you all the sad feels
This is one of the hardest things anyone have to do, rest in peace dear Maya!

She lived her best whole life thanks to you Pewds
She will always be remembered and also in a better place
I hadn't watched Pewds in a year, I didn't know this. I dunno, but this hits my heart hard. Rest in peace Maya.

Maya was a special dog and you gave her a special life with much love. There's nothing more a dog and a family member could ask for. We grew up with her and now we must move on without her although we'll still carry on our memories of her. My condolences <3 she was loved by millions, our little Jabba the Hut.
You gave Maya the best life she could've ever lived. She didn't know it, but there were over 100 million people she gave joy to every time she appeared.
Losing a dog is heart breaking. Stay strong Pewds, you gave her everything you could.
I'm sure Maya lived a very happy life and that's more than anyone could ask for. Stay strong, you both. Tons of love.
Well, I cried. They were all lucky to find each other.

It's a heartwarming feeling knowing they spent the remaining time they had with Maya and yet also a breaking thing; it's tough losing a family member. It's saddening, just hearing people are looking for their dog's grave site. Let Maya's soul rest, it stirs things up in a not so good way.
Didn't expect to cry tonight but here we are. Miss you Maya.
Man seeing pewdiepie cry is making me cry
I get a heartattack whenever I see the word 'goodbye' in pewds titles knowing What's to come vvvv soon:(

This video broke me. Having watched pewds all throughout my childhood and teens I have grown a connection to those dogs and hearing the news felt like a baseball bat to the head. Im sorry for your loss Felix.
i enjoy "new pewdiepie"  its like he has aged with us.

This is the first time I feel devastated after someone's dog passing. Maya always cheer me up whenever I see her one-eyed face. I still remember the first time I saw her, it was one of your Fridays with Pewdiepie eps. She's also one of the reasons why I always check your channel from time to time. To see if she's still around. Thank you for being part of a lot of people's childhood. We will surely miss you a lot, Maya!

We had seen Maya since the beginning, but it’s hard to not see her now and even til the end. Earliest memory I remember of Maya in Pewds’ older vids is the Jabba the Hutt vid and she said “Help”. Man just remembering it and typing this out makes me wanna cry. And just seeing Pewds cry just makes me cry more and more.

Maya is like one of the foundations of this channel and its also hard for me as a long time fan of Pewds to see Maya pass away. You will always be remembered Maya. Fly high Queen.

And Good Job as always to Pewds and Marzia for taking so much care of her. You've done your very best. Your pets are so blessed to have you as their family member.
Lost my dad less than a month ago and it feels like yesterday. The unconditional love of a pet shouldn't be underestimated. Condolences to everyone who's lost someone in 2022. It will get better
You guys gave her the best life. So even though it’s sad, it’s wonderful how much joy you gave her and how much joy she gave you
17 years man, more than the average lifespan of any pug. Just shows how much love and care Maya got from you guys.

Maya cemented the family you and Marzia began ( you too Edgar). She was with you both as your love grew and you got married. 
May you rest easy sweet Maya, you were successful as part of bringing two of the sweetest people together  ️
Maya is the dog I wont forget no matter what. When a pet has a strong connection with your family, its a family member, stay strong king
lost my cat nearly a year ago an the pain sticks with you. It took me days to look at a pic of her without crying profusely. I saw the news last year of your pug. Pewds we love you

Maya will never be forgotten. I remember her as a fun dog and I have been subbed since 2011. I lost a pet of my own not too long ago either. Edgar and Maya will always be in my mind when I think of Pewdie. :)
As a long time fan, it was hard to hear that Maya passed. She was the sweetest baby I'm sorry for your family's loss.

Strange I think I’ve been watching you since 2012. I was a little kid now I’m 24 years old. Love always coming back to check on you, and watch you grow up and become the person you are to evolve. Have a good new year my friend

Seeing old pewdiepie videos when i was in my 20s with that little dog behind him ,sometimes holding her up in the end of the video to give a little paw brofist and now in my 30s i see this goodbye video its so damn sad

Maya was such a lucky dog to be loved so much by you, Marzia, and Edgar! Losing a pet is the same as losing family because they are your family. She got the best life you could have given her. The care and effort you gave her truly showed throughout these videos. Nothing good lasts forever, but the time you had and the memories she gave you are so beautiful. 

Rest in peace Maya, and I hope your family continues to heal.
You did more than enough Pewds. Maya lived beyond her expectations, and did so in the lap of luxury and puppy paradise.

Maya outlived the expected lifespan by 2-4 years which is amazing and just shows much well taken care of she have been her whole
life. She's missed by everyone and she's been part of the channel since the beginning. ️

I just lost my dog 2 days ago. And I can’t explain the depression and denial I feel that he’s gone. I really wish there was a way to still see him and escape to a world with him and take care of him in some spirit world.. life so cruel when you have to lose your best friends

Man... I still can't believe she's gone, For as long as I've been subbed since...2012 I felt like I've been on such an amazing Journey with you, Marzia and your dogs it's wild man... I'm glad you and your family is healing ;w; R.i.p Maya We'll miss you... heh I'm still a member of the Bro army... always :) Thank you Felix... for everything.

I love how this videos just make me value the small things in life, to see pewds having a great time in an abandoned building and recalling the moments he had with Maya, just makes me appreciate life as we have.
Rest in peace Maya, from everyone around the world, we will miss you.
Rest in peace Maya it is so sad to know you have left all of us. I feel like we have all grew up with Maya and Edgar <3 Rest Easy Maya We Love You
I just lost my dog today.. had to watch this video again. It breaks my heart losing our dog, she is indeed a family member

It’s almost like Maya was holding on to keep her bud Edgar company.  Once Momo had arrived, she knew her Edgar, and Felix and Marzia, would be in good hands, and she could finally rest.  Rest in Peace sweet Maya, you brought joy to millions of people
after watching this channel for 10 years it feels like a family member is gone, she is being grieved worldwide

You gave Maya the best life she could have. She surely enjoyed her life a lot with you as a family. It's always sad to see someone you love to leave but I hope that in heaven or where ever she may be, she looks to you and can say that she had a good life. Rest easy Maya

I've been watching you since 2012 when i was 16, i almost feel like i grew up with you, Marzia and Maya over the past 11 years. Even if i'm now not watching you as much as i used to : i will always remember Maya as a part of the whole "Pewdiepie story". May she RIP. You did good bro
Pewds I'm sorry man. We lost our dog Kitty last December. They are family. As my friend Cesar Milan says, Dog is love. Thanks for sharing Maya with us
Fuck man just fuck. This made me tear up. Maya was a part of my childhood and im gonna miss her.
You guys did a beautiful job taking care of maya, I'm sure she enjoyed every single moment of it

I'm so sorry for your loss, Felix and Marzia. My family dog passed away at 17 years old too. We had her since she was a puppy and I was about 4 years old. She also became mostly blind and deaf but was still energetic for about anotjer 5 years. It was when she got dementia that things started to get real. It is actually so hard losing a pet, especially when they have been in your life for so long. Tearing up at this video ans the thought of my passed pup.

„She was cheaper because she had one eye… We didn‘t care.“
Gosh, I‘m sobbing. Obviously you guys didn‘t care because you loved Maya the right way, the way she deserved. You and Marzia gave her the best life, I‘m sure of it. I‘ve been with the Broarmy since 2011 and losing her has felt like losing a lifetime pet of my own. Sending lots of love and support

Maya always looked so happy and relaxed in your videos. I'm sure she couldn't have asked for better owners. Never forget that even though her road ends here you gave her a beautiful life filled with love and affection. Stand proud you two.
My heart goes out to you guys. I lost both my older cats this year and even though I knew they were older, it was still really hard. It gets better with time.
You've grown up so much dude so humble I'm proud of u
As an owner of 2 pugs it breaks my heart to hear this Felix I'm sorry

You guys did the best you could, and Maya turned out to be one of the sweetest dogs to ever touch this Earth. It's truly saddening to hear that she passed, but know that she'll be forever grateful knowing she was raised by the best of parents. You and Marzia did an amazing job, so please do not put yourself down. Everything's gonna be okay 

Also, goddamn Momo can jump like Bambi!

I'm so sorry for your loss Felix :( I lost my puppy of 11 years a while ago and it was the hardest thing...it really was like a family member had just passed away. I feel for you both and hope you can find joy in those that are still there and in the memories you made with Maya. To be honest, I'm sitting here crying because it reminded me of my sweet Shari but I cherish even these sad moments. She will never leave my memory just like I'm sure Maya will never leave yours. Dogs bring such joy to our lives and they don't want anything in return. They are truly the purest creatures on this Earth. Be well my friend!

I may not watch this channel as regularly as I did before -- but Maya was one of the reasons I stuck around. Sorry for your loss, Felix. Just know she lived a great life with you and you did the best you could with what you had. I also think she knew you'd be fine and it was her time to go, with a new puppy to watch over you guys for her when she's gone.
Wishing all the best for you pewds, really hope you get a lot more happiness this year you’ve helped me for a long time with out knowing it and I just hope things go your way.

I grew up with so many dogs and they really are gifts to mankind. Just remember this , your pet may pass one day but the memories will always be there. Love ya man and thoughts and prayers with you all.

As someone that also lost a precious pet this past year around the same age, I can promise you those moments meant everything to that darling girl. It’s been absolutely wonderful watching you and Marzia grow ever since I started high school.
Better days will indeed come. <3

I came here because I just got a call from my mom.

One of our dogs (we have 2 Shih Tzus) was just euthanized. He got sick yesterday evening, so they took it to the vet, turns out he had a big tumor near his liver, pressing against his vital organs. So we could wait a couple more weeks or ease the pain. They chose the 2nd option.

I feel sad, angry, and guilty because I believe we could have done something earlier if we knew. But I find comfort in telling myself his pain didn't last long.

His name was Jetro, born August 15 2014, died at 9. He was a stubborn little fellow, always ready to remind the other dogs he was strong tho he was short, but he was also a ball of love.

He was my first dog and losing him hits very very hard. His little brother (not of blood but friendship), Newton, will have a weird time being suddenly alone, he apparently already is seeking for him in the house. I knew the day would come we would have to say goodbye, I just didn't expect it to be so soon.

Stay safe you all, and remember, these pets are a part of our lifes, but to them, we are their WHOLE life. Cherish them.
So glad you guys have each other and Edgar and Momo to help you heal during this difficult time. Losing a family member is never easy. Sending love.
That puppy has such a personality. Thanks for sharing those cute and funny moments. Sorry for y'alls loss, you did do everything by the way. You loved her and gave her the absolute best life.

It's always hard losing a pet and feeling like you weren't able to do enough, but according to Google a pug's average lifespan is between 12-15 years and Maya made it to a whopping 17-18 years! Despite her health problems, with yours and Marzia's love and care she excelled and I'm sure she was very content and happy in her life! I don't think under both of your care that she has ever had a sad day in her life!

I’ve been a part of the Bro Army since2008-2009, and it breaks my heart.  Congratulations on the Baby!  I’m so proud of you Pewds/Felix, and I wish you and Marzia the most happiness you could ever hope to experience.
Losing a furry friend is one of the hardest pains. Rest easy, Maya. She'll always be in our hearts <3

She had a wonderful life and a loving home with you and that's what it's all about for dogs. I lost my old girl back in October, she also had dementia and was deaf too, too say we miss her is such an understatement, every day I think of her and tears come to my eyes. I can say that it will get easier as the days, weeks and months go by. It's not that you will forget her, it's more that the painful memories are slowly replaced with the happy memories. When you see photos you will smile more than cry, it does get better x
It's never easy losing a family member. Just know you did everything you could and she had the best parents she could've asked for. May you always have happy memories of Maya <3
Came back to this video after my own dog was put to sleep. Felt like this was this year but damn, it has been 2 years since maya is gone, crazy how time flies…

So sorry about Maya, Pewds. I was getting choked up when you were talking about her. A few months ago I had to say goodbye to my chocolate lab I had for 12 years and it’s such a crappy feeling. Keep your head up my dude.

As a vet tech you had the best looking and seeminy well taken care of pugs ive EVER seen in my last 5 years if working with animals. You guys did great jobs and they had good lives because of you pewds ^-^
You are the most wholesome person on Earth, Pewds.  So sorry for your loss.  Stay strong.

I haven’t caught up too much on pewds recently, but I saw this title and knew exactly what it was gonna be. Rest in peace, you little meatball. You were always loved by many more than your little goblin brain could know and you will be dearly missed.
I watched Felix for so many years and he's changed so much in such a short time, although I don't watch him anymore. Knowing that he's finally happy is so heartwarming
Seeing someone lose their dog is the worst thing ever. I feel so sad for Pewds. My dog is 16 years 8 months, and we dont have much left with her so i really understand the feelings you have! SAD
I just lost my dog of 17 years. Hearing you speak about Maya and your memories with her was so lovely. These small creatures mean so much. Rest in Peace Maya and Snowy (my dog)

man, thats rough
she had a good life with you 2
I lost my dog almost a year ago. It’s so hard. It tears up your heart. Maya knows she was loved. I’m glad you all have each other. Momo and Edgar playing is so precious!

So sad to see her passing. Man, looking at Pewds, he’s so mellow now compared to when he was screaming and swearing years ago. I hit 37 and felt bad about not being as crazy as I was, so it was really nice seeing his evolution over these years. Makes me feel better about getting older and mellowing out. Japan is great, I hope you enjoy your time here, man.
You did everything you could, she was such a happy and lucky for having you both as family <3 she´s resting now
I know im late but rest in peace, Maya.This actually made me cry.
Maya will always be immortal through your videos.
My heart goes out to you Pewds. You're a beautiful soul and I can tell how much you loved Maya. Watching you cry was just heartbreaking.....
This made me cry so bad i remember when you first got her and seeing this now i cried so hard :(
12:48 it was enough, you did everything you could to make sure she lived a good life and just be happy with time you had with eachother

i lost a dog who was 14 years old last year, and i know the felling of doing everything we could and that still not being enought.. but the not being enought is relative, we did everything possible to do, and that's how we knew that he would part away peacefully,  even that not being easy. But nowadays we are completely sure that he's now up there in his prime, running healthy, barking and watching for us just like we always did  with him. Every scar heals with time. They may not disappear but they hurt less. 
Be safe, be good, love ya

Dam Pewds, I remember watching both you and Maya growing up over 10 years ago. I haven't watched you in a while but hearing this news made me remember all the times you both made me laugh and smile. You and Marzia really loved her and gave her the best life a dog could wish for. I wish you and Marzia the best in this sad time and hope for brighter times this year and onwards.

Peace and love,
Jason

When a pet of mine dies, i always think that they would want us to adopt others so that they can also experience the love we gave to them. I am sure she will be happy that there is another with whom they will get to experience the love you gave them

After so many years of watching your videos we’ve also seen Maya grow up and it’s really sad to see her go.  It is nice however to see that Momo and Edgar are getting along so well and Edgar still has so much energy.  My condolences Pewds.
PewDiePie must be the most respectfull internet character who had the good ending. Bro's like Uncle Iroh from Avatar
coming back here after a year...just feels like yesterday seeing Maya in one of your gaming/reaction videos
